testcase.name: To validate response with all user details
testcase.system-out: Given I start wiremock server...............................................passed When I send get request.....................................................passed Then I should be able to get response of all users..........................passed

testcase.name: To validate response of a single user detail

testcase.name: To validate response to create a new user detail

testcase.name: To validate response to delete an user detail
